scripts.build: pegjs -e "(typeof module==='object'?module:(this.\$interpol=this.\$interpol||{}))[typeof module==='object'?'exports':'parser']" lib/parser.pegjs build/parser.js && cat lib/interpol.js lib/resolvers/system.js lib/resolvers/helper.js lib/resolvers/memory.js > build/interpol.js && uglifyjs -m --preamble "`cat doc/preamble.js`" build/interpol.js -o build/interpol.min.js && cat build/interpol.js build/parser.js | uglifyjs -m --preamble "`cat doc/preamble.js`" > build/interpol-parser.min.js
